form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION, 4

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/30/2023 .sh) Form Approved. DEPARTMENT OF STATE Budget Bureau No. 47-R150.2. FOREIGN SERVICE OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA APPLICATION FOR IMMIGRANT VISA AND ALIEN REGISTRATION UCTIONS: This form must be filled out in DUPLICATE by typewriter, or if by hand in legible block letters. ALL ions must be answered, if applicable. Questions which are not applicable should be so marked. If there is insufficient room he form, answer on separate sheets, in duplicate using the same numbers as appear on the form. Attach the sheets to the forms. J NOT SIGN this form until instructed to do so by the consular officer. The fee for filing this application for an immigrant visa i $5.00. The fee should be paid in United States dollars or local currency equivalent or by bank draft, when you appear before the consular officer. WARNING: Any false statement or concealment of a material fact may result in your permanent exclusion from the United States. Even though you should be admitted to the United States, a fraudulent entry could be ground for your prosecution and/or deportation. I hereby apply for an immigrant visa and alien registration at the United States Consulate General at Bombay, India and state the following facts: 1. My family name is DESAI My first name is BHAGWANTRAI My middle name is GULABSHANKER 2. My full name in native alphabet (If other than Roman letters are used) is Erries 00140212 36162132 3. Other names I have used or by which I have been known are (If married woman, give maiden name) 4. The date of my birth is 5. My place of birth is (Day) (Month) (Year) (City or town) (Province) (Country) 10th July 1911 JUNAGADH GUJARAT INDIA 6. My age is 7. My present calling or occupation is 56 years 2 on Detal Surgeon 8. My present address is 370, Bhandarker Road, Gangar Niwas, Matunga, Bombay 19. 9. My sex is 10. My marital status is Single (never married) Married Widowed Divorced Separated ONCE Male Female Including my present marriage, I have been married times. 11. My nationality is Indian 12. My personal description is 13. I have the following visible marks of identification (a) Color of hair (c) Height Black & White 5 feet 1 " inches Scar on the back of left hand (b) Color of eyes Black (d) Complexion palm. fair 14. My purpose in going to the United States is Joining my brother's family. 15. I intend to remain in the United States permanently or (Give length of 16. I intend to enter the United States at the port of time) Ind√®finite Los Angeles 17. I (Do) (Do Not) have a ticket to my final destination I do have a ticket. 18. (a) I am going to the United States to join the following person (Give name 18. (b) I am sponsored by the following person and/or organization (Give and address and relationship, if any) Brother. address if different from (a)) Dr. R. G. Desai, Chief of Hematology Sponsored by Dr R.G. Desai, Orange County General Hospital Orange California. U. .A 101, Manchester Avenue, Orange Cali, U.S.A. 19. My final address in the United States is c/o. ,G. Desai, Chief of Hematology Orange County General Hospital, Orange, Cali. S. A. 20. My personal financial resources are (a) Cash (c) Real estate (value) (b) Bank deposits (d) Other THIS FORM MAY BE OBTAINED GRATIS AT CONSULAR OFFICES OF THE UNITED STATES OF AMERICA
